long_description: This REI dog water bowl hydrates thirsty pups. Its generous capacity and intelligent design carry easily when full or collapsed. Reflective printing increases visibility at night to help prevent accidental tip overs. Internal stiffener keeps water bowl opening rigid enough for even the thirstiest, big-muzzled mutts to lap from. 100% post-consumer recycled PET body fabric withstands wear and tear. Waterproof coated-nylon lining with seamless construction preventss leakage. Molded bottom panel and tapered shape keep bowl from easily tipping over and facilitate moving the bowl when full. Elastic band on bottom secures empty bowl when it's folded flat.
short_description: This REI dog water bowl hydrates thirsty pups. Its generous capacity and intelligent design carry easily when full or collapsed.
